segments.text: Room service.What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I find the sheet in my room is so stained.Would you please help us change it for a clean one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry.sir . Someone will there in a moment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Please be quick about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . I assure you it would never happen again .
segments.speaker: S1
